QuestData.Title: The Bloodmane
QuestData.Description: We had just arrived and begun the service of the headless fowl when the Bloodmane attacked out of nowhere.$b$bClearly, this means that the Raven Mother wishes to test the worthiness of her children. Fear not, we are steadfast and will fervently continue our prayers regardless of what may come!$b$b<Sekara leans in and whispers to you.>$b$bAlthough, if you can get rid of the Bloodmane and their leader that would be a blessing as well.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Huntmaster Sorrowfang and $1oa Bloodmane Razorclaws.
QuestData.CompletionText: The Bloodmane will not shake our faith.$b$bHowever, if you could kill a few more it would make it easier for the Raven Mother to hear our prayers.
QuestData.RewardText: Your strength has given us time to rest and continue our rituals.$b$bMay the Raven Mother ever keep you in her shadow.
